snippet: A 20-year-old man, identified as Brandon Reese, was charged with assault, criminal possession of a weapon and criminal use of a firearm.
abstract: Brandon Reese of Brooklyn is charged with murder in connection with shooting of four teenagers that left 18-year-old Mario Lopez dead; police believe shooting was outburst of gang violence.
lead_paragraph: A 20-year-old man, identified as Brandon Reese, was charged with assault, criminal possession of a weapon and criminal use of a firearm.

headline.main: Arrest in Shooting of 4 Brooklyn Teenagers
headline.print_headline: Arrest in Shooting of 4 Brooklyn Teenagers
